mapper.select: select id, menu_id, name, url from sys_privilege
select p.id, p.menu_id, p.name, p.url from sys_role_privilege rp left join sys_privilege p on p.id = rp.privilege_id where rp.role_id = ${roleId} order by p.id
select p.url from sys_role_privilege rp left join sys_privilege p on p.id = rp.privilege_id where rp.role_id = ${roleId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_role_privilege WHERE privilege_id IN (SELECT id FROM sys_privilege WHERE menu_id = ${menuId})
